title: Software Engineer
description:
• At least a BS in Computer Science, Physics, Mathematics or related field.
  • Good working knowledge of C and C++, Java/JavaScript.
full_description:
LAHITECH is looking for talented, growth-oriented and dynamic individuals with strong analytical skills.
Our development teams are a select group of talented individuals who work together to create innovative new technologies that are changing the face of the software development tools market. This is a unique opportunity to join a dynamic company that is currently experiencing explosive growth.
Qualifications:
At least a BS in Computer Science, Physics, Mathematics or related field
 Good working knowledge of C and C++, Java/JavaScriptExperience working in the UNIX or Windows 95/98/NT/2000 environmentsStrong problem solving and communication skills
 Self-motivated and responsible
Benefits:
 Be part of a well-established, growing high-tech software development company
 Salary based on experience
 
Opportunity for growth and advancement

To apply:
Via Email : jobs@lahitech.com
